bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Comparison Table does not properly show bool values
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Trying to reproduce the issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/polyaxon/polyaxon/issues/945>#945</denchmark-link> I noticed that the table is not properly showing boolean values. It seems that the schema properly detects the bool type, but the renderer does not print the proper value: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/89122703-d547f800-d4c9-11ea-8631-da229df5e4e9.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
V1.1.5 I am not sure this issue was there before.
